extendedInfo.description: The Pregnancy Reporter App enables you to follow the baby's developments week-by-week in the mother's womb. You will be presented with a list of information about changes the baby may be experiencing, along with stats about the baby's size, weight, trimester, etc. Pregnancy Reporter is the perfect app for a pregnant mom-to-be, expecting father, friend, or family member.Pregnancy Reporter includes the option to add a widget that will display daily information about the current week or an inspirational quote along with the current week and day. To Add the widget press and hold the home screen until the "Add to Home Screen" menu appears, Select "Widgets" then "Pregnancy Reporter"

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love app!!
reviews.author: Michelle Esquivel

reviews.title: Very limited use
reviews.comment: Very limited use without purchasing the full version of it..
reviews.author: Michael Moskwa

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: Cool widget on home screen that changes periodically to cute quotes and \"what\'s happening now with the baby\" stats but clicking on the widget brings you to a rather plain and static UI. Doesn\'t change much at all over time and it\'s not interesting to look at. Can\'t do much with it. The widget is nice but the app\'s home screen needs work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Simple information make me remember my baby  progress. ..thx developer  Five star if there is available composing baby name too
reviews.author: Didot Didot

reviews.title: Kind of boring
reviews.comment: I like the widget and how it changes throughout the day but the normal app page is boring because its the same all week..

reviews.title: Lovely and simple
